images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of our offline simulation framework for skill discovery in software scripting automation. The framework consists of two components: (1) Task Creation (Section3.1), utilizing two simulation strategies: top-down functionality guidance and bottom-up API synergy exploration to generate a wide range of tasks; and (2) Skill Generation with Trials (Section3.2), where LLMs iteratively refine scripts based on execution feedback to produce verified skills ready for runtime retrieval.
Table 1:An example skill,arrangeInCircle.Descis the natural language description.Effectshows the layout before and after running the skill.
